parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: EndTimeStamp
parameters.description: The end time. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page. We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: SrcIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the attack.

parameters.name: StartTimeStamp
parameters.description: The start time. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: StatisticsType
parameters.description:
The type of the attack source statistics. Valid values:

*   **TOP_ATTACKED_AGENT**: the top 5 probes that are attacked the most frequently
*   **TOP_ATTACKED_IP**: the top 5 IP addresses that are attacked the most frequently
*   **ATTACK_EVENT_TYPE**: the type of the intrusion event
*   **ATTACK_HONEYPOT_TYPE**: the type of the attacked honeypot
